mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATION VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{notificationContent}, DEFAULT, #{memberNo}, #{quickLink}, DEFAULT, #{typeNo})
mapper.select:
SELECT NOTIFICATION_NO, NOTIFICATION_CONTENT , NOTIFICATION_STATUS , QUICK_LINK,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - NOTIFICATION_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - NOTIFICATION_DATE ) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - NOTIFICATION_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - NOTIFICATION_DATE ) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - NOTIFICATION_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - NOTIFICATION_DATE ) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(NOTIFICATION_DATE , 'MM"월" DD"일", YYYY') END NOTIFICATION_DATE
FROM NOTIFICATION n WHERE MEMBER_NO = 2 ORDER BY NOTIFICATION_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTIFICATION WHERE NOTIFICATION_STATUS = 'N'
